title: Bring Your Own Craft Meetup
description: Come join us for another in-person event! This meetup will be held at the Wicker Park Bucktown Library and will be BYOC (Bring your own craft). Is your craft too large to bring in person? No worries! We will have adult coloring books for you to use. Feel free to come for part of the event, or all of it! RSVP required.

title: September Queer Crafting Potluck
description: Bring a dish or two & come on over for a night of queer crafting n' fun! You don't have to be queer to attend, allies are welcome!! RSVP required.

title: Chicago Tool Library Block Party
description: Breezy & Leah will be hosting a booth at the Chicago Tool Library Block Party!! Stop by to say hi, decorate a ✨crafty✨ sticker, and support the Chicago Tool Library. There will be food, tool demos, activities, and tons more fun.
